definition.name: cibuildwheel
definition.description: Installs and runs cibuildwheel on the current runner
definition.author: pypa

inputs.name: output-dir
inputs.description: Folder to place the outputs in, defaults to "wheelhouse"

inputs.name: config-file
inputs.description: File containing the config, defaults to {package}/pyproject.toml

inputs.name: only
inputs.description: Build a specific wheel only. No need for arch/platform if this is set

inputs.name: extras
inputs.description: Comma-separated list of extras to install
